languages.text: "Осквернять священный суд колдовством, особенно над {mf|тем|той}, кого уже коснулась скверна, было бы в высшей степени неосмотрительно. Вам отказано в просьбе".
"Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."
languages.original_text: "Осквернять священный суд колдовством, особенно над {mf|тем|той}, кого уже коснулась скверна, было бы в высшей степени неосмотрительно. Вам отказано в просьбе".

traits.locale_text: "Inviting a psyker here would be highly imprudent. Your request is denied."
"Inviting a psyker here would be highly imprudent. Your request is denied."
"Inviting a psyker here would be highly imprudent. Your request is denied."
"Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."
"Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

languages.text: "Die Entweihung dieses heiligen Gerichts mittels Hexerei, noch dazu gegen eine Person, die bereits von der Verderbnis berührt wurde, wäre ausgesprochen unklug. Antrag abgewiesen."
languages.original_text: "Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entweihung dieses heiligen Gerichts mittels Hexerei, noch dazu gegen eine Person, die bereits von der Verderbnis berührt wurde, wäre ausgesprochen unklug. Antrag abgewiesen."

languages.text: « Profaner cette cour sacrée en recourant à la sorcellerie, en particulier sur un individu ayant déjà été entaché par la corruption, serait d'une grande imprudence. Votre demande est donc refusée. »
languages.original_text: "Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

traits.locale_text: « Profaner cette cour sacrée en recourant à la sorcellerie, en particulier sur un individu ayant déjà été entaché par la corruption, serait d'une grande imprudence. Votre demande est donc refusée. »

languages.text: “使用巫术玷污神圣的法庭，尤其还要将巫术用在已经受腐化影响的人身上，这恐怕太不明智了。我在此拒绝你的请求。”
languages.original_text: "Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

traits.locale_text: “使用巫术玷污神圣的法庭，尤其还要将巫术用在已经受腐化影响的人身上，这恐怕太不明智了。我在此拒绝你的请求。”

languages.text: «Profanar este tribunal sagrado con hechicería y, especialmente, usarlo contra alguien que ya está mancillad{mf|o|a} por la corrupción sería una grave insensatez. Su solicitud queda denegada».
languages.original_text: "Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

traits.locale_text: «Profanar este tribunal sagrado con hechicería y, especialmente, usarlo contra alguien que ya está mancillad{mf|o|a} por la corrupción sería una grave insensatez. Su solicitud queda denegada».

languages.text: 「この神聖なる法廷を魔術で汚し、とりわけ、すでに堕落に触れた者にそれを用いるのは極めて愚かな行為です。よって、あなたの要求は却下します」
languages.original_text: "Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

traits.locale_text: 「この神聖なる法廷を魔術で汚し、とりわけ、すでに堕落に触れた者にそれを用いるのは極めて愚かな行為です。よって、あなたの要求は却下します」

languages.text: "Kutsal mahkemeyi sahirlikle kirletmek, hele böylesi bir fenalığı zaten yozluk etkisi altındaki birine uygun görmek akıl kârı değildir. Talep reddedilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Defiling this sacred court with sorcery and especially using it on someone who has already been touched by corruption would be most unwise. Your request is denied."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal mahkemeyi sahirlikle kirletmek, hele böylesi bir fenalığı zaten yozluk etkisi altındaki birine uygun görmek akıl kârı değildir. Talep reddedilmiştir."
